results.name: default/wordpress-deployment-c9897f5c6-dglfg

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: Get "http://10.244.1.2:80/wp-admin/install.php": context deadline exceeded (Client.Timeout exceeded while awaiting headers)

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because it couldn't connect to the service in time, resulting in a timeout.

Solution: 
1. Check network connectivity to the pod.
2. Ensure the service is running on the correct port.
3. Increase the timeout setting for the readiness probe.

results.name: default/wordpress-service

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-deployment-c9897f5c6-dglfg], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service is missing ready endpoints because the specified pod is not ready.

Solution: 
1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`.
2. Inspect pod details using `kubectl describe pod <pod-name>`.
3. Look for readiness probe issues.
4. Fix any errors and redeploy if necessary.
